hu.kazocsaba.imageviewer

Class DefaultStatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.imageviewer.StatusBar
      • hu.kazocsaba.imageviewer.PixelInfoStatusBar
        • hu.kazocsaba.imageviewer.DefaultStatusBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageMouseMotionListener, EventListener

    public class DefaultStatusBar
extends PixelInfoStatusBar
implements ImageMouseMotionListener
    A default status bar implementation that displays the current mouse position (in pixel coordinates) and the colour of the pixel under the cursor.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba
